statements: DELETE FROM pollutants WHERE id = 3 AND source = 'Factory A';
DELETE FROM pollutants WHERE concentration > 2.5 OR pollutant_type = 'PM2.5';
DELETE FROM Pollutants WHERE id = 1 AND source_id = 3;
DELETE FROM SiteRemediation WHERE site_name = 'Site A'
DELETE FROM sources_of_pollutants WHERE source_name = 'Factory A';
DELETE FROM pollutants WHERE type = 'Chemical' AND source_id IS NULL;
DELETE FROM samples WHERE quantity > 100 AND site_id = 3;
